## Data cleaning

### Laod Data and simple statistics

As the data description in GEO, there are 30 samples. 31 columns are observed in each table of the supplementary file, the first column is the Gene identifier. 
```{r, error=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
sfiles = getGEOSuppFiles('GSE153873')
fnames = rownames(sfiles)

b2 = read.delim(fnames[2], header = TRUE)
b3 = read.delim(fnames[3], header = TRUE)

dim(b2)
dim(b3)
```
